summary.span: 一个特性，可应用于服务协定以支持工作流服务模型调度行为。

span.span: An attribute that can be applied to a service contract to enable workflow service model dispatch behavior.

summary.span: 该属性可确保创建适当的调度组件。

span.span: This attribute ensures that appropriate dispatch components are created.
